Q_DESC:
Operation on middle element:
Write a menu driven program using stack and implement using doubly-linked list.
The operations are as follows:
1) push() which adds an element to the top of stack.
2) pop() which removes an element from top of stack.
3) findMiddle() which will print middle element of the stack.
Run till user enters 0
INPUT
First line contains the choice of the user
OUTPUT
The output prints the required action.
TESTCASE_1:
1
5
5 4 3 2 1
2
3
0
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Item popped is 1
Middle Element is 4
TESTCASE_2:
1
7
11 22 33 44 55 66 77
2
2
3
0
###---###SEPERATOR---###---
Item popped is 77
Item popped is 66
Middle Element is 33
